name: Legend Of Kilrock
description:
This is my special 10th game in my game a week series!

Take on the epic quest of defeating an ancient evil known as Kilrock! Progress through 4 unique zones each filled with enemies and loot!

This game is a mashup of roguelike, soulslike, and turn-based action. Pay attention to enemies actions, each enemy has a unique action list to learn in order to best them.

Besting enemies awards experience, every level up you get 5 points to spend on your stats. Strength: the magnitude of your attacks. Agility: the quickness of your attacks, and dodges. Vitality: your health total. Stamina: your energy to use actions.

Enemies drop random loot, will you get lucky with all powerful gear, or be stuck with basic gear?

Keep your eye out for chests, they contain potions to boost your hero!

There is no saving, no lives, and permadeath!

Controls And Tips:

WASD to move, you move 1 tile at a time. Enemies adjacent to you will start combat.

Escape to close the game at any time.

Blocking costs 50 energy, but a successful block will restore some energy to help with follow up attacks!

Traveling to new areas may unequip your items, make sure to put your clothes back on before exploring!
